item.title: Ocoee River Middle Whitewater Rafting Trip (Most Popular Tour)
item.description: Go whitewater rafting in Tennessee with this half-day adventure along the Ocoee River. Get a safety introduction and board a bus for a ride through the Cherokee National Forest to reach the departure point. Climb aboard the raft and experience more than 20 class III and class IV rapids while descending the river gorge. There are opportunities to swim in the river if you wish. No prior rafting experience is necessary.

image.alt: Ocoee River Middle Whitewater Rafting Trip (Most Popular Tour)

item.title: Murder & Mayhem Haunted History Walking Tour
item.description: Discover the dark side of Chattanooga's storied past on this thrilling walking ghost tour. See the city's spookiest haunts alongside a local and professional guide for a tour as haunting as it is historical. Hear stories of lurking spirits and make a few stops along the way to take photos or potential supernatural beings.

image.alt: Murder & Mayhem Haunted History Walking Tour

item.title: Downtown Chattanooga Food Tour
item.description: During this small-group, guided Chattanooga food crawl, you’ll discover top delicacies in the downtown district. Sample dishes at up to four curated dining locations for the same cost and time as your standard dinner out, including optional wine pairings. Choose from three itineraries: West Village, Electric Bike Lunch Tour, and Art and Southern Cuisine.

image.alt: Downtown Chattanooga Food Tour

item.title: Nickajack Bat Cave Kayak Tour with Chattanooga Guided Adventures
item.description: With as many as 100,000 endangered grey bats coming to roost around the caves of Nickajack Lake, this kayaking tour near Chattanooga offers an exceptional opportunity to watch them on their nightly hunts. You’ll visit the Nickajack Bat Cave and Wildlife Refuge in the Tennessee River and paddle out to the bat cave. While these animals take to the sky during sunset, you’ll learn about the local efforts made to protect and preserve the species.

image.alt: Nickajack Bat Cave Kayak Tour with Chattanooga Guided Adventures

item.title: Middle Ocoee River Rafting Adventure Tour
item.description: Get a new perspective on Chattanooga with a rafting adventure tour on the Middle Ocoee River. After a safety demonstration, set off on a white water rafting excursion through the scenic Cherokee National Forest. Experience class III and IV rapids as you descend the river gorge. Paddle through the rapids during this exhilarating river adventure.

image.alt: Middle Ocoee River Rafting Adventure Tour

item.title: Classic Middle Ocoee River Adventure
item.description: The rushing waters of the Middle Ocoee River are your playground during this whitewater adventure. Climb into a kayak and paddle down the Middle Section of the Ocoee River through Chattanooga National Forest with a guide. Those new to this adrenaline-filled sport will find the pre-launch safety briefing and orientation helpful. Paddle through more than five-miles of the river where you’ll encounter 270-foot drops and Class III/IV waves.

image.alt: Classic Middle Ocoee River Adventure

item.title: Full River Rafting Adventure on the Ocoee River / Catered Lunch
item.description: Go white water rafting in Tennessee with this half-day, small-group adventure on the Ocoee River. Get your adrenaline pumping during this seasonal excursion along 10 miles of rapids, including class III and IV rapids. A riverside picnic lunch is also included. Children must be at least 12 years old to participate.

image.alt: Full River Rafting Adventure on the Ocoee River / Catered Lunch

item.title: ChattaBOOga Ghost Walk Tour in Chattanooga
item.description: Discover the spooky side of Chattanooga with a ghost-themed walking tour. Meet your guide for a city stroll to hear haunted tales and ghost stories connected to city history. See local landmarks like the Fireman’s Memorial Fountain and Hamilton County Courthouse during the walk. Learn about how fires, floods, disease, and war all made Chattanooga a prime place for ghosts.

image.alt: ChattaBOOga Ghost Walk Tour in Chattanooga

item.title: Full Ocoee River Rafting Adventure with a Riverside Lunch
item.description: The Ocoee River is one of the most popular destinations for whitewater rafting in Tennessee and flows through the heart of the Cherokee National Forest. On this tour, you’ll get a full day on the water, with full instruction and lunch included. Get your adrenaline pumping as you tackle Class III and IV rapids, admire the views as you cruise downstream, and raft down part of the ‘Olympic section’.

image.alt: Full Ocoee River Rafting Adventure with a Riverside Lunch

item.title: Derailed: Trolley Tour and Train Ride in Chattanooga
item.description: This is a tour focused on Chattnooga's rich transportation heritage. It includes a ride on a classic train on an historic railroad. Learn about the role that various forms of transportation has played in Chattanooga, and how Chattanooga has played a role in those forms of transportation over the years. Feel what it was like to travel by passenger train decades ago, and see behind the scenes of a railroad museum.

image.alt: Derailed: Trolley Tour and Train Ride in Chattanooga

item.title: Saving Christmas Escape Room in Chattanooga
item.description: There are so many fun activities to do during Christmastime, but many are right in the middle of huge crowds. Book this Chattanooga Saving Christmas Escape Room and have some fun without being pushed around by the masses. This experience is done with the group you choose. Play a fun, interactive game that’s holiday themed and work together to get Santa's sack back in time to save Christmas.

image.alt: Saving Christmas Escape Room in Chattanooga

item.title: Chattanooga "Secret Agent" Escape Room Admission Ticket
item.description: Discover London in 1963 with this gaming experience in Chattanooga. Test your problem-solving skills with an admission ticket to this escape room which puts you in the role of a MI6 secret agent. Track down the villain and immerse yourself in a historical experience with this one-hour gaming session. This tour is a shared experience, meaning multiple groups can book into the same escape room.

image.alt: Chattanooga "Secret Agent" Escape Room Admission Ticket

item.title: ChattaBrunch Food Tour
item.description: Explore Southside Chattanooga with a food-focused small-group walking tour. Meet your guide and set out on a city stroll to learn about the history and people behind the traditional flavors of Chattanooga. Visit four different restaurants and meet the proprietors behind these establishments, all while tasting tapas-sized dishes. Maximize time in Chattanooga with this local-led tour.

image.alt: ChattaBrunch Food Tour

item.title: Sabotage: 1944
item.description: This escape room adventure transports you back in time to 1944 in Chattanooga as you work to thwart a deadly plot, letting you learn about the region's history in a fun and engaging way. You’ll immerse yourself in the story of Chattanooga’s famous railroads and World War II as you attempt to find the villain scheming to sabotage trains carrying troops and war supplies, for an activity that will keep the whole group engaged.

image.alt: Sabotage: 1944

item.title: Cursed in Chattanooga Haunted Walking Tour
item.description: With blood-soaked grounds, haunted taverns, and a not-quite-ancient curse, one thing is sure: Chattanooga’s haunted side runs as fast as its chugs and choo-choos. On this guided, small-group tour, you’ll hear all its wild stories, meet its “spirited” characters, wander its spookiest streets, and maybe even catch some ghostly action yourself.

image.alt: Cursed in Chattanooga Haunted Walking Tour

item.title: National Medal of Honor Heritage Museum Admission Ticket in Chattanooga
item.description: Prebook your National Medal of Honor Heritage Center Admission Ticket before you arrive in Chattanooga and secure your time at the museum as it’s one of the city’s newest attractions and can fill up fast. Use your ticket during the center’s operating hours and go at your own pace through the exhibit. Plus, you’ll also start your visit with a short video explaining the importance of the National Medal of Honor.

image.alt: National Medal of Honor Heritage Museum Admission Ticket in Chattanooga

item.title: Family-Friendly Ghost Tour in Chattanooga
item.description: Uncover the spooky past of Chattanooga, Tennessee when you embark on this family-friendly ghost tour through the city’s historic locations. Listen to stories from the Civil War, murders, and other otherwordly sightings as you make your way around the city. Stroll along the river, stop at the Hunter Museum of American Art, walk along Cherry Street, and see the romantic May’s Urban Mansion.

image.alt: Family-Friendly Ghost Tour in Chattanooga

item.title: Chattanooga: City Trolley Tour with Coker Automotive Museum visit
item.description: Chattanooga history, cars and art, and much more. You will board at the historic Chattanooga Choo Choo, Chattanooga's Last standing historic train terminal. Our first stop on the tour will be the Coker museum. At the Coker museum you will get to see an amazing collection of vehicles. After that we will have a wonderful tour of the city learning of it's history and pointing points of interest. We will take a trip through the nations oldest and second largest national cemetery, then we will have a stop at the Sculpture fields, the southeast's largest sculpture park. Finally we will return to where we started, the Chattanooga Choo Choo.

image.alt: Chattanooga: City Trolley Tour with Coker Automotive Museum visit

item.title: Private Helicopter Tour of Downtown Chattanooga
item.description: Discover Chattanooga from the sky with a private helicopter tour. Meet your pilot guide for a private flight over downtown Chattanooga including popular landmarks like the Tennessee River, the Chattanooga National Cemetery, and AT&T Field. Customize the tour if there’s anything in particular you’d like to see and enjoy a bird's eye view of the city.

image.alt: Private Helicopter Tour of Downtown Chattanooga

item.title: Ghost & Booze Tour of Chattanooga - 21+ Over
item.description: Hit the best bars in Chattanooga plus here scary tales of the souls lingering inside them on this small-group ghost and booze tour. Your guide takes you through Chattanooga’s Historic District, breaking down the macabre, haunted layers of the buildings you pass by. You’ll learn more about the city than from any guidebook, and have a chance to buy drinks at local taverns, too.

image.alt: Ghost & Booze Tour of Chattanooga - 21+ Over

item.title: Chattanooga "C-Block Prison Break" Escape Room Admission Ticket
item.description: In this Chattanooga escape room, you find clues, decode messages, and work together with your team to break out of prison after serving time for a crime you didn’t commit. This prison-themed game is full of realistic details that let you get lost in the game and escape reality as you race against the clock to win.

image.alt: Chattanooga "C-Block Prison Break" Escape Room Admission Ticket

item.title: Chattanooga "Locker Room Lockdown: Mascot Rescue" Escape Room Admission Ticket
item.description: Experience the gaming fun of an escape room in Chattanooga with this admission ticket. Sign up for this group session to try your hand at puzzles and race to beat the other team. Learn teamwork skills and strengthen bonds during this Locker Room Lockdown: Mascot Rescue experience. Plan something fun and unique for kids during your visit to Chattanooga with this escape room admission ticket. This tour is a shared experience, meaning multiple groups can book into the same escape room.

image.alt: Chattanooga "Locker Room Lockdown: Mascot Rescue" Escape Room Admission Ticket

item.title: King Tut's Tomb Escape Room Experience in Chattanooga
item.description: Put your problem-solving skills to the test when you book this escape room experience in Chattanooga. This shared, small-group experience follows Howard Carter’s 1922 archaeological dig in Egypt in search of King Tut’s tomb. You have one hour to find the burial chamber before the authorities arrive and shut the whole site down for good. This tour is a shared experience, meaning multiple groups can book into the same escape room.

image.alt: King Tut's Tomb Escape Room Experience in Chattanooga

item.title: Kigali City Tour with a Local Guide and Driver
item.description:
•Personalized Exploration: Tailored to you, dive into Kigali's essence.
• Cultural Immersion: Engage locally, beyond typical tourist spots.
• Complete Experience: From history to vistas, uncover Kigali's gems.
• Expertly Guided: Insightful tours led by knowledgeable guides.
Set out on an extraordinary journey through the heart of Kigali with our bespoke city tour. Delve into Rwanda's capital, where every moment is crafted to offer a unique and unforgettable experience. From somber reflections at the Genocide Memorial to vibrant markets and hidden treasures, immerse yourself in the essence of this vibrant metropolis. Plus, enjoy added convenience with pick-up and drop-off services, along with a delightful lunch at a local restaurant, all curated to enhance your tour experience.

image.alt: Kigali City Tour with a Local Guide and Driver
